doc:
James Avery (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Avery_(actor) 0 James LaRue Avery (November 27, 1945 – December 31, 2013) was an American actor and poet. A prolific television actor, he is best remembered for his portrayal of patriarch "Uncle Phil" Banks in the sitcom The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air. His voice acting work was mostly in animated series. James_LaRue_Avery ( November_27_,_1945 – December_31_,_2013 ) was an_American_actor_and_poet . A_prolific_television_actor , he is_best_remembered for his_portrayal of patriarch_"_Uncle_Phil_"_Banks in the_sitcom The_Fresh_Prince of Bel-Air . His_voice_acting_work was mostly in animated_series .
